titles.title: PREPARE Act of 2013
Prepare, Ready, Equip, and Prevent Areas at Risk of Emergency Wildfires Act of 2013
A bill to amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to provide for wildfire mitigation grants, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
